title: Is it possible to make Rs. 50000 a month with freelance content writing? - Quora

response.answer_text: 100% it is. It’s also possible to make 500,000. Sky is the limit. Freelance content writing is a trust-based and value-based business. If someone is trusting you with their brand, it means a lot to them. Freelance content writing is a ‘creative’ service and therefore can be priced on ‘value’ rather than per word. Think of a landing page of a website, if it is a money-making website, those words are hinting towards an action. Those words are 100% worth more than a per-word basis. Those words, if it generates them a million bucks in sale, but you charged per-word…. should make you feel like you did something wrong and you’re not compensated fairly. 50,000 or 500,000 The choice is yours.
Yes, definitely. You just have to make sure you are targeting the right content writing jobs. Be prepared to work for 30–40 hrs a week, if you’re targeting an income of ₹50k per month.

Of course! Depends on the clients and assignments though. If you end up spending most of the time with low paying assignments, and slow paying clients, it might be difficult. So, negotiate your rates, check out project details and outline an agreement, before getting to work. :) - The Lazy Writer
